snippet: An increase would help 27.8 million people. It would also help balance power in the workplace.
abstract: Editorial offers answers to some basic questions about the need for an increase in the federal minimum wage as Congress begins its debate about the issue; contends the argument against raising the minimum wage is political, not economic.
lead_paragraph: An increase would help 27.8 million people. It would also help balance power in the workplace.

headline.main: The Case for a Higher Minimum Wage
headline.print_headline: The Case for a Higher Minimum Wage
